plot outline: Basavaraju is an arrogant rich kid who obsessed with his schoolmate Shruthi for which he kills his school principal and is sent to jail. After which Shruthi's parents change her identity and shift her to Hyderabad. There, she gets close to an easy going guy named Rana. When everything seems to be going well in their life, Basavaraju returns from Jail and starts looking for Shruthi.
title: Juvva
plot: Girl who changes her identity to escape from a sadist, falls in love with an easygoing guy. The sadist tries to find her and what happens next is the story.

Basavaraju is an arrogant rich kid who obsessed with his schoolmate Shruthi for which he kills his school principal and is sent to jail. After which Shruthi's parents change her identity and shift her to Hyderabad. There, she gets close to an easy going guy named Rana. When everything seems to be going well in their life, Basavaraju returns from Jail and starts looking for Shruthi.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
